EmailTemplate.name: Second Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Periodic Activity Report {!Case.CaseNumber} - Final Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
**This is an automated email message. When replying to this message, please KEEP THE SUBJECT LINE UNCHANGED and USE THE “REPLY TO ALL” button to keep your Honeywell CBM in all of your responses.**
Urgent Reminder:
Agreement Ref. No. {!Case.Reference_Number__c}
Dear Honeywell Sales Intermediary,
We would like to inform you that despite previous reminders, we still have not received a duly completed Periodic Activity Report form that was due {!Case.Due_Date__c}.
Please complete the attached form and send it back to Honeywell within next 5 business days. If the form is not obtained by Honeywell within the specified additional period, the compensation payments for your services may be suspended.
Should you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact your Honeywell Sponsor who is copied on this email.
Kind regards,
Honeywell Aerospace Team
{!Case.Thread_Id}
